works.title: 鱼灯 AIGC 视觉研究
works.desc_cn: 非遗鱼灯与未来 AI 光影的结合。
works.desc_en: Merging Chinese Heritage with futuristic AI lighting.
works.fullDesc_cn: 该项目探索了中国传统灯会与现代数字美学的交汇点。通过定制化 Stable Diffusion 模型，重新定义东方光影。
works.fullDesc_en: This project explores the intersection of traditional Chinese lantern festivals and modern digital aesthetics. Redefining Oriental light and shadow through customized Stable Diffusion models.

works.title: 汉代拓片重构
works.desc_cn: 将汉代拓片纹样重塑为高端时尚视觉。
works.desc_en: Ancient stone rubbing textures for fashion branding.
works.fullDesc_cn: 汲取汉代石刻浮雕灵感，专注于“水墨”拓片技法与现代时尚排版的碰撞。
works.fullDesc_en: Inspired by Han Dynasty stone reliefs, focusing on the collision between 'ink' rubbing techniques and modern fashion typography.

works.title: FinTech 品牌识别
works.desc_cn: 为科技平台构建的极简视觉识别系统。
works.desc_en: Minimalist visual system for technology platform.
works.fullDesc_cn: 为金融科技初创公司创建一个可靠、创新且具备国际化视野的品牌形象。
works.fullDesc_en: Creating a reliable, innovative, and international brand image for a FinTech startup.
